localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you don’t want to share in images you’re going to share anyway. Hide people’s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
blogPost.body: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you don’t want to share in images you’re going to share anyway. Hide people’s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
blogPost.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets
blogPost.author: Geoff Pado

localize.description: 分享你的图像，而不是你的秘密。黑色荧光笔让你可以轻松地隐藏你不想分享的图片中的文字。只需快速涂鸦，就能隐藏人们的姓名、电子邮件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的图像而不是你的秘密

localize.description: 分享你的圖像，而不是你的祕密。黑色熒光筆讓你可以輕鬆地隱藏你不想分享的圖片中的文字。只需快速塗鴉，就能隱藏人們的姓名、電子郵件地址等。
localize.tagline: 分享你的圖像而不是你的祕密

next.excerpt: Yuzu lets anyone build human-in-the-loop business processes without code. We combine powerful automations & integrations with the people-orchestration of a project management tool to keep your processes running to schedule.
next.title: Yuzu - Build complex, human-in-the-loop processes without code

localize.description: Yuzu让任何人都可以在没有代码的情况下建立人在圈内的业务流程。我们将强大的自动化和集成与项目管理工具的人员编排相结合，使您的流程按计划运行。
localize.tagline: 构建复杂的、无需代码的人机交互流程

localize.description: Yuzu讓任何人都可以在沒有代碼的情況下建立人在圈內的業務流程。我們將強大的自動化和集成與項目管理工具的人員編排相結合，使您的流程按計劃運行。
localize.tagline: 構建複雜的、無需代碼的人機交互流程
